title: Tesla requests approval for revamp of German plant - application documents
text: Tesla has requested approval from German local authorities to make sweeping changes to its plant near Berlin including building a water recycling facility and extending battery cell production, application documents published on Wednesday showed.

title: Cathie Wood's ARK funds shed more Tesla and Coinbase shares, continue Twilio buying spree
text: Funds associated with ARK Investment have been offloading shares of Tesla Inc. and Coinbase Global Inc. lately, and they continued that pattern Tuesday.

title: Will Tesla's Cybertruck Push Up ETFs Heavy on the EV Maker?
text: With Tesla completing the production of its first cybertruck and robust quarterly growth expected, is it time to invest in Tesla-heavy ETFs? take a look.

title: S&P 500, Nasdaq: Highest Levels in 15 Months
text: Tomorrow is the most consequential Q2 earnings day yet: not only Tesla (TSLA) and Netflix (NFLX) after the close, but also Goldman Sachs (GS) and United (UAL) before the bell.

title: Anticipation Rides High as Tesla Gears up for its Q2 Earnings
text: As Tesla readies for its Q2 earnings release, the financial world is set to focus on key issues, including the company's gross margin, the production status of the highly anticipated Cybertruck, and Tesla's ambitious expansion plans aiming for a ten-fold increase in production capacity by the end of the decade.

title: Tesla directors returning $735M to settle excess compensation suit
text: The settlement agreement calls for the director defendants to provide Tesla with the value of more than 3.1 million stock options.

title: Forget Tesla: These 3 EV Stocks Could Be Better Bets Right Now
text: The electric vehicle (EV) industry is thriving and shows no signs of slowing down. With 10% of the nation's light-duty vehicle market being electric, there is significant growth potential.

title: 3 EV Charging Stocks That AI Is Loving in July
text: This July, some of the hottest investment opportunities lie in EV charging stocks. Their potential to drive gains is robust, and getting a leg up on understanding this space could prove advantageous.

title: Cathie Wood's ARK drops more Tesla, Coinbase shares
text: Funds related to Cathie Wood's ARK Invest dumped $14 million in Tesla stock and another $26 million in Coinbase shares, according to trade disclosures on Monday.

title: Elon Musk's stress-tests: The Tesla CEO has an approach for picking leaders and sussing out anyone 'bullshitting' him, biographer says
text: Walter Isaacson said Elon Musk uses multiple tactics when it comes to selecting leaders. Musk uses long stretches of silence and gauges how staff respond to criticism, the biographer said.

title: 'Margins, margins, margins': Here's what Wall Street is looking for in Tesla's 2nd-quarter earnings
text: Tesla is scheduled to report second-quarter earnings on Wednesday after the market close. Wall Street is laser focused on the company's profit margins after the company cut prices for its vehicles.

title: TSLY: The Wrong Way To Play Tesla
text: The YieldMax TSLA Option Income Strategy ETF offers a yield of 33.7% by replicating the price dynamics of Tesla stock through an option strategy. The ETF's strategy involves buying at-the-money call options and selling ATM put options on TSLA, as well as selling short out-of-the-money call options on TSLA and holding cash and US Treasuries. TSLY could be considered by speculative traders, who have developed a view on TSLA's share price trading sideways or gradually ticking higher.

title: Ford Embraces Tesla's Price War
text: Ford Motor Company ( F , Financial) announced on July 17 that it is slashing the prices of F-150 Lightning electric trucks, which was met with a 5% decline in its stock price as investors weighed the impact of these price cuts on the profitability of the company. The F-150 Lightning Pro will now cost $49,995, a 16.6% decrease from the maximum retail sales price of $59,974 in the past.

title: E-Pickup Battle Escalates: F Cuts Price, TSLA Unveils Cybertruck
text: The developments from Ford (F) and Tesla (TSLA) indicate that the e-pickup space is heating up, with competition expected to intensify as RIVN, GM, STLA and others vie to secure their market share.

title: Investing In Tesla Stock Isn't About Elon Musk – It's About Margin Compression
text: Since its inception, Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA ) has been defying norms and pushing boundaries. Its ambitious mission to “accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy” has propelled it to the forefront of the global EV industry.

text: ASML Holdings' machines are going to play an important role in driving the adoption of AI applications. Tesla is ramping up its AI infrastructure to make its cars better, and this could help the company tap a multibillion-dollar opportunity.

title: Q2 Earnings Could Drive Tesla ETFs Higher
text: Tesla has a reasonable chance of beating estimates this quarter.

title: Inflation figures, Severn Trent, Tesla and Netflix due on Wednesday
text: Inflation should be the dominant theme on Wednesday, with an update after data a month ago showed UK core inflation hitting a 31-year high, while the headline consumer price index also surprisingly held steady at 8.7%, when it had been expected to ease. Another surprise on the upside could force the Bank of England to hike rates to 5.5% at the meeting next month.

title: Tesla's board of directors will return $735 million on claims they were overpaid
text: Tesla directors are returning $735 million to the company to settle a suit that claims they were overpaid. That includes $458.6 million in company shares and $276.6 million in cash, per court filings.

title: Tesla stock could ‘skyrocket' after earnings, says market analyst
text: Tesla's (NASDAQ: TSLA) stock is on the verge of reaching the $300 mark, building momentum ahead of its upcoming earnings report scheduled for Wednesday, July 19.

title: Forget Tesla's Earnings. Keep Your Eyes on These.
text: Tesla's second-quarter report is coming. Investors will study the electronic-vehicle giant's earnings, but they will be keen to see capacity, among other things.

title: Growth And Earnings Recovery, Probable Fed Pivot And High Quality Stocks With Victor Dergunov
text: Victor Dergunov runs The Financial Prophet and today talks Q2 earnings, Fed's probable pivot, inflation, and high quality stocks. Continue to buy high quality companies on pullbacks and why Victor believes in Tesla.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark dumps Tesla stock ahead of results
text: Ark Invest, the asset management group led by Cathie Wood, drained over US$13mln worth of Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) shares from its ETFs ahead of the electric car manufacturers' second quarter results on Wednesday. Over 38,000 shares were dumped from the group's lead fund the ARK Innovation ETF, while around 6,8000 shares we dropped from the ARK Next Generation Internet ETF.

title: Cybertruck Rally Triggers Cathie Wood Tesla Stock Dump Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
text: Cybertruck news buoyed Tesla stock Monday and Cathie Wood sold more that $13 million in TSLA. The EV giant reports Q2 earnings Wednesday.

title: US opens new special probe into fatal Tesla crash
text: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Tuesday it is opening a new special crash investigation into a fatal accident in California involving a 2018 Tesla Model 3 where advanced driver assistance systems are suspected of having been used.

title: Tesla releases quarterly earnings tomorrow: is Tesla stock a buy or a sell?
text: Tomorrow is a big day for Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) investors – the company will announce its Q2 2023 earnings after the market close on July 19, 2023. It is no small deal for Tesla fans, as the stock is up +168.62% YTD.

title: Tesla directors will return $735 million to company to settle shareholder suit
text: Tesla directors will return $735 million to the company to settle claims they grossly overpaid themselves in one of the largest shareholder settlements of its kind, according to a Monday filing in a Delaware court.

title: Sinking Shares: Why These 3 Growth Stocks Are No Longer Worth Holding
text: Stocks, much like all of life, are very dynamic. As companies' offerings and macro environments change, the attractiveness of their stocks fluctuates.

title: Are Last Year's Stock Splits for Amazon, Google, and Tesla Paying Off Now?
text: The 2022 stock splits for Amazon, Alphabet, and Tesla didn't provide immediate catalysts. But retail investors are flocking to all three stocks this year with different market dynamics at work.

title: Tesla to hold citizen information session on expansion plans for German plant
text: Tesla is due to hold a question-and-answer session on Tuesday for citizens in the German state of Brandenburg on the ramifications of a planned expansion of its EV and battery plant which would make the site the biggest car plant in the country.
